name: 2048 (itch) (ZEN)
description:
2048 Remade with randomly generated colour palettes, smooth animations and minimal UI.   Controls:
WASD / ↑←↓→ / SWIPE   How to play:
Combine tiles on the 4x4 grid by sliding tiles of the same value into one another.
When the grid is full and you are unable to slide any tiles the game has ended.   Objective:
Try to get the highest score possible / Combine tiles to create a tile of value 2048

 

Made in a few days to test out Godot mobile support.
